content: --ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} born or produced before or formerly, first-produced, first-born. {2} ancient, old. {3} eastern. (--जः {1} an elder brother; <ls>Śi. 6. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 36.</ls> {2} the son of the elder wife. {3} an ancestor, a forefather: स पूर्वजानां कपिलेन रोषात् <ls>R. 16. 34.</ls> {4} (<ab>pl.</ab>) the progenitors of mankind. {5} the Manes living in the world of the moon. (--जा an elder sister.
